Description.Text: Facilities The hotel comprises a total of 127 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a baggage storage service, a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, room service, a conference room and a business centre. Wireless internet access in public areas allows travellers to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the establishment. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning and a kitchen. A sofabed ensures a good night's sleep. There is also a safe. A kitchenette equipped with a fridge, a microwave and a tea/coffee station is also provided as standard. An ironing set is also available for guests' convenience. Other features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and WiFi. The accommodation units include a bathroom with a hot tub. The accommodation offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment Sport and leisure activities are offered by the hotel and third-party operators. A range of options are available, including a gym and a sauna. Meals Travellers can choose between the following bookable options: breakfast, lunch and dinner.
